thread.title: Aging gangster accused of 'Goodfellas' heist goes on trial
thread.title_full: Aging gangster accused of 'Goodfellas' heist goes on trial

author: Elizabeth Williams
title: Aging gangster accused of 'Goodfellas' heist goes on trial
text:
Aging gangster accused of 'Goodfellas' heist goes on trial Elizabeth Williams 0 In this courtroom sketch, former Bonanno crime family underboss Salvatore Vitale testifies during the trial of reputed gangster Vincent Asaro, Monday, Oct. 19, 2015, at federal court in the Brooklyn borough of New York. The legendary 1978 theft at the Kennedy Airport's Lufthansa cargo terminal was dramatized in the hit film "Goodfellas." (Elizabeth Williams via AP) Elizabeth Williams As featured on
